home.subtitle: Unified workspace for Business Impact Analysis and Control Self Assessment modules.

header.title: Business Impact Analyses
header.subtitle: Track, update and export your organisation's BIAs from a single workspace.

empty.title: No BIAs recorded yet.
empty.body: Create a new analysis or import an existing dataset to get started.

tooltips.name: Enter the official service or product name that stakeholders recognise.

context_form.responsible_hint: Only assessment managers or administrators can assign the owner.

environments.section_help: Toggle the lifecycle environments this component uses and capture their authentication method.

unassigned.title: Components without authentication type

flash.no_templates_import_first: No templates available yet. Import controls first.

dashboard.title: CSA Dashboard
dashboard.heading: Control Self Assessment
dashboard.lead: Monitor progress, review assignments, and maintain the control catalogue.

latest.title: Recently Updated Assessments
latest.empty: No assessments have been recorded yet. Import control templates and start the CSA workflow to populate this list.

start.title: Start Assessment
start.heading: Start a self-assessment
start.intro: Choose an active template to begin completing control evidence.

template.label: Template
template.help: Templates are backed by the imported control catalogue.

available.title: Available templates
available.empty: No templates available yet. Import controls to populate this list.

assign.title: Assign Assessment
assign.heading: Assign a self-assessment
assign.intro: Select an assignee, template, and optional due date for the assessment.

assignee.label: Assign to
assignee.help: Only active users appear in this list.

template.label: Template
template.help: Choose the template that aligns with the relevant control.

due_date.label: Due date
due_date.help: Optional: assign a target completion date.

overview.title: Assessment Overview
overview.heading: Assessment Overview
overview.intro: Track every assessment, status, and owner from a single overview.

design.label: Control design
design.q1: Is the control clearly and unambiguously documented in an approved policy or procedure?
design.q2: Is a clear control owner assigned who has ultimate accountability for this control?
design.q3: Are the roles and responsibilities for executing the control clearly described and assigned?

operation.label: Control operation
operation.q1: Has the control been executed consistently according to the procedure during the recent period?
operation.q2: Can you provide evidence demonstrating consistent execution of the control (e.g. logs, reports, screenshots)?
operation.q3: Are any deviations or exceptions from the procedure documented and approved?

monitoring.label: Monitoring and improvement
monitoring.q1: Is the effectiveness of this control monitored and reported to the control owner on a periodic basis?
monitoring.q2: Has the control been evaluated within the past year to confirm that it remains effective and efficient?
monitoring.q3: Have improvement actions been identified and implemented based on evaluations or detected deviations?

detail.title: Assessment {id}

questions.title: Questions
questions.empty_section: No questions configured for this section.
questions.none: This template does not have any questions yet.

detail.locked: This assessment is locked because it has already been submitted.

delete.title: Danger zone
delete.body: Deleting an assessment removes all responses and assignments. This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this assessment?

review.heading: Review
review.comment_placeholder: Add context when approving or reasons when returning.

qa.title: Questions and answers
qa.no_sections: This template does not contain questions.

note.label: Note:
note.body: This document is a static snapshot of the assessment detail view.

import.title: Import Controls
import.heading: Import controls
import.intro: Upload a JSON catalogue or load the bundled ISO 27002 reference set.

data_file.label: JSON file
data_file.help: The file must contain a top-level controls array.

page.title: Control administration
page.heading: Control catalogue administration
page.subtitle: Create or import controls to keep CSA assessments aligned with your frameworks.
page.dataset_hint: Use the bundled ISO 27002 JSON or the parsed NIST SP 800-53 dataset to seed the catalogue.

manual.title: Create control manually
manual.intro: Define individual controls without uploading a JSON catalogue.
manual.name_help: Displayed as the catalog entry title.
manual.description_help: Optional context shown alongside this control.

help.code: A unique identifier for this control (e.g. ISO-27001-5.1).
help.name: A short, descriptive name for the control.

risks.title: Risk register
risks.heading: Risk register
risks.subtitle: Record identified risks, their treatments, and severity assignments across eligible BIA components.

form.description_placeholder: Describe the scenario, trigger, and potential effect.
form.csa_help: Select at least one CSA control when the treatment strategy is Mitigate.
form.no_components: No eligible components found. Enable risk assessments on a BIA context first.

actions.confirm_delete: Delete this risk entry? This action cannot be undone.

errors.invalid_components: Select components that allow risk tracking.
errors.invalid_controls: Select valid CSA controls before saving.

thresholds.title: Severity matrix
thresholds.heading: Severity thresholds
thresholds.subtitle: Adjust the score ranges used to label risks as low, moderate, high, or critical.

errors.overlap: Thresholds cannot overlap. Adjust the ranges and try again.
errors.invalid_range: Maximum score must be greater than or equal to the minimum score.
errors.no_selection: Select a severity range to update.

edit.title: Edit risk · {title}
edit.heading: Edit {title}
edit.subtitle: Update fields and severity for this risk entry.

notices.mfa_required: Complete multi-factor authentication to finish signing in.

changelog.title: Change log
changelog.intro: Track feature updates and fixes delivered to the assessment platform.
changelog.archive_note: For earlier milestones see docs/history.md in the repository.

items.locale_preference: Added per-user language preference managed from the profile page.
items.login_selector: Introduced language selector on the login page with session persistence for guests.
items.catalog_repair: Rebuilt translation catalogs to restore English labels and align Dutch equivalents.

items.foundation: Bootstrapped the modular Flask scaffold with shared configuration and navigation.
items.documentation: Documented architecture, deployments, and future migration roadmap.

ticket.help_text: Optional. Attaches context for remediation work, e.g. Jira or ServiceNow.

help.impact_areas: Select every domain that experiences disruption when this risk materialises.

processing_goal.text: Briefly describe the purpose of the processing.
processing_goal.help: What problem does this solve? What is the intended outcome?

personal_data.help: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.

ai_usage.text: Does the processing rely on any form of Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
ai_usage.help: Think of machine learning, neural networks, etc.

special_categories.text: Are special categories of personal data processed?
special_categories.help: For example health, race, political opinions, etc.

large_scale.help: Is the processing aimed at many data subjects or very large datasets?

automated_decisions.text: Does the system autonomously make decisions with significant consequences for a person?
automated_decisions.help: For example automatically rejecting an application, loan, or insurance.
